<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6231</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Basic Islam - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Islam básico - Cuestionario</string>
            <string language="ga">Ioslam Bunúsach – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegender Islam - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Islam de base - Jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Islam Básico - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Islam Di base - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικό Ισλάμ - διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Engages the student in active learning with the intention of encouraging further exploration.</string>
            <string language="es">Implica al estudiante en el aprendizaje activo con la intención de animarle a buscar más información.</string>
            <string language="ga">Spreagann sé an dalta chun foghlam gníomhach chun tuilleadh fiosraithe a spreagadh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Engagiert sich den Kursteilnehmer im aktiven 
Lernen mit der Absicht der anregenden weiteren Erforschung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Engage l'étudiant dans l'étude active avec 
l'intention d'autre exploration encourageante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acopla o estudante na aprendizagem ativa com a 
intenção da exploração mais adicional incentivando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggancia l'allievo nell'imparare attivo con 
l'intenzione di ulteriore esplorazione consigliante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμμετέχει το σπουδαστή στην ενεργό εκμάθηση με την 
πρόθεση την περαιτέρω εξερεύνηση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
